name: Pictured Crossword - 2022 February
description:
A crossword puzzle where many of the hints are pictures!

The hints are also embedded inside the grid.

You can also solve the digital version if you wish, using either keyboard, mouse, or both, or download and print the PNG-file and solve it with a pen.

I can't test Mac and Linux versions, but they should work.

Tools used: Construct 3, LibreOffice Calc

Images:

Body part: https://openclipart.org/detail/5176/leg

Bowl: https://openclipart.org/detail/181366/cook

Filled pie chart: https://openclipart.org/detail/271734/fraction-1010

Flag with 3 stripes: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7b/Flag_of_Venezuela_%28state%2...

Flag with a cross: https://openclipart.org/detail/252222/flag-of-iceland-bevelled

Gray cloud: https://openclipart.org/detail/210347/misc-mental-worry

Green creature: https://openclipart.org/detail/239407/ogre-simplified

Musical note: https://openclipart.org/detail/170723/note-icon

Plant: https://openclipart.org/detail/13141/reed

Pole with a cloth on it: https://openclipart.org/detail/233722/old-thomas

Rock with a hole in it: https://openclipart.org/detail/11433/rpg-map-symbols-cave-entrance-2

Simple monster: https://openclipart.org/detail/167774/monsternoshadow

Speech bubble: https://openclipart.org/detail/167841/money-is-not-speech-22

Square: https://openclipart.org/detail/82729/simple-red-square

Waterway: https://openclipart.org/detail/286771/flume

Rest of the images I drew myself.
